title: KubeCon Europe: How Kubernetes Handles 6G, LLMs and Deep Space
author: B Cameron Gain
description: How Kubernetes faces new challenges in managing large language models, 5G and 6G telecommunications, and astronomy data wrangling.
cntitle: KubeCon 欧洲站：Kubernetes 如何处理 6G、LLM 和深空
cndescription: Kubernetes 如何应对管理大型语言模型、5G 和 6G 电信以及天文数据处理方面的新挑战。
